title: Intermediate German II
description: LTGM 2B is a continuation of LTGM 2A for those students who intend to practice their skills in reading, listening comprehension, and writing on a more advanced level. The literary texts are supplemented by readings from other disciplines as well as audiovisual materials.  Prerequisites:  LTGM 2A or score of 4 on AP German language exam or consent of instructor.
